text.section: Each warrant of the Finance and Administration Cabinet upon the Treasury shall specify the date, amount, and person to whom payable, and no money shall be disbursed by the Treasurer unless the warrant contains these specifications.

No warrant shall be issued unless the money to pay it has been appropriated by law. The Finance and Administration Cabinet may require any claimant to state on the face of his claim the law under which it is payable.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art, II, 9(1). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 143, 146, 1992b-37, 4689.
